explanation: [0-0] A person holds an orange, long balloon in their left hand and a pair of red scissors in their right hand. The balloon has a black smiley emoji on it. There is a green oval plate behind the balloon.

[0-10] Next, the person cuts the orange balloon with the scissors, and some red confetti falls into the green oval plate. Then the balloon bursts open, and a large amount of red confetti falls into the plate. Then the scene changes to a person holding a green, long balloon in their left hand. The balloon has a black squinting emoji on it. They cut the balloon open again with the red scissors, and the green liquid inside spills onto the oval plate.
